title: Trying to restore my Pixel 4 xl, but donÂ´t see any pixel 4 xl backups
content:
I did a backup sync of my pixel 4 xl and then a reset.
When i now try to do a restore i dont se the option to restore from pixel 4 xl only from my tablet.

I can see the restore data in my google drive. How do i proced? I really need to be able to restore the phone from the backup pixel 4 xl??
